name: Klonoa: Phantasy Reverie Series
storyline: Play as the dream traveller Klonoa through colorful environments and use your skills with the wi d bullet to solve puzzles and unravel the mysteries of the worlds.
summary: Klonoa Phantasy Reverie Series brings back "Klonoa: Door to Phantomile" and "Klonoa 2: Lunatea's Veil" remastered in one collection to fans new and old. Get ready to set off on an adventure to save the world in this 3D side-scrolling action game.
